title: or under the provisions of the enactments specified in the Schedule are delegated
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Education (Delegation of Ministerial
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Education (Delegation of Ministerial 

Functions) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited education (delegation ministerial functions) order 2025

title: or under the provisions of the enactments specified in the Schedule are delegated
heading: 2. The powers and duties of the Minister for Education conferred on her by
text_raw:
2. The powers and duties of the Minister for Education conferred on her by 
or under the provisions of the enactments specified in the Schedule are delegated 
to Michael Moynihan, Minister of State at the Department of Education. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 18th April, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [165] 3
text_norm: 2 power duty minister education conferred provision enactment specified schedule delegated michael moynihan minister state department education notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 18th april 2025 165 3

title: or under the provisions of the enactments specified in the Schedule are delegated
heading: Section 7(1)(a) of the Education Act 1998 (No. 51 of 1998), in so far as that
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Section 7(1)(a) of the Education Act 1998 (No. 51 of 1998), in so far as that 
paragraph relates to persons with a disability or other special educational needs 
(both within the meaning of section 2(1) of that Act) 

Section 7(1)(c)(ii) of the Education Act 1998, in so far as it relates to transport 
services 

Subsections (3) and (4) of section 7 of the Education Act 1998, in so far as those 
subsections relate to the performance of the other functions under that Act 
delegated by this order 

Section 33(i) and (j)(iv) of the Education Act 1998, in so far as those provisions 
relate to persons with a disability or other special educational needs (both within 
the meaning of section 2(1) of that Act) 

Section 37A (inserted by section 8 of the Education (Admission to Schools) Act 
2018 (No. 14 of 2018)) of the Education Act 1998 

Sections 21, 22 and 28 of, and Schedule 1 to, the Education for Persons with 
Special Educational Needs Act 2004 (No. 30 of 2004) 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

15 April, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [165] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
